story.storybody:
Kolkata, Jun 1 (PTI) Barely two days after a 24-year-old woman was gangraped in a moving car in the upscale Sector V, one person was today held for alleged attempt to sexually assault a girl in the same area of Salt Lake city.

The accused, Mrityunjay Mondal (21), visited his friend, a teenaged girl, when her parents were not at home at Udaypally this morning, police said.

He took the girl to an under-construction building on pretext of an outing and allegedly tried to sexually assault her, they said.

After the girls brother returned home around noon, he did not find her sister home and started a search. When he reached the construction site, he found that the accused was trying to sexually assault her, police said.

"When the brother tried to save the girl two friends of the accused tried to stop him... But somehow he managed to flee from the place with his sister," he said.

Later, the family lodged a complaint on the basis of which the trio, all residents of the same locality, were detained and after questioning the accused person was arrested, police said. PTI SCH SUS SMN
story.shortheadline: Girl sexually assaulted in Salt Lake, 1 arrested
story.storytitle: Girl sexually assaulted in Salt Lake, 1 arrested
